stories.text: With the advances into the WSL and potential running of Android apps on W11. Is Microsoft just creating more and more vulnerability for themselves opening up windows to completely different operating environment? There is some malware out there that is already trying to do harm through WSL and so I see this a new threat landscape.
stories.title: WSL and Android Apps on W11
